title: Azul Latin Kitchen to host fundraiser for Bread & Broth | South Lake Tahoe - SouthTahoeNow.com
text: Azul Latin Kitchen to host fundraiser for Bread & Broth Submitted by [paula](/users/paula)on Thu, 11/07/2024 - 1:18pmEvent Date: November 12, 2024 - 5:00pm SOUTH LAKE TAHOE, Calif. - Azul Latin Kitchen in Heavenly Village will host a taco buffet fundraiser on Tuesday, November 12, from 5 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. to benefit Bread & Broth. A taco/nacho bar with tortillas, chips, salsa, guacamole, beans, rice, a variety ofmeat/vegetarian options, and various toppings will be available. The cost of the event is $20 for adults and $10 for kids, not including drinks. All proceeds from the buffet and drink sales (including tips), a raffle, and a silent auction will be donated to Bread & Broth. Bread & Broth is a Lake Tahoe South Shore charitable, all-volunteer organization that provides hot meals twice weekly for those facing food insecurity, weekend food bags for children in local schools and at local childcare centers, and a summer food program for children during the break from school. Multiple raffle prizes from local businesses, restaurants, and spas, will be available and several items will be listed in the silent auction. Raffle tickets are $5 a piece or $20 for 5 tickets. Chris Seal, a local musician, will be providing music inside for guests. Parking will be available after 5 p.m. in the Heavenly Village parking garage for $5. Azul has hosted these events for local non-profits over the past several years. Azul employees will be volunteering their time to work at the event doing various jobs such as bartending, serving, bussing, assisting with the buffet, and distributing raffle tickets. Please join the Bread & Broth organization and Azul for a fun-filled evening that will help us continue to feed food-insecure individuals, families, and children in our community.
